meanings.definition: Lacking a plan, purpose, or enthusiasm; random or disconnected.
meanings.sent1: Her desultory attempts at studying never led to good grades.
meanings.sent2: The desultory conversation wandered from topic to topic without any clear direction.
meanings.sent3: His desultory cleaning of the room left it messier than before.
meanings.sent4: The desultory raindrops fell sporadically, creating a patchy pattern on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The desultory melody of the wind chimes filled the air with a sense of aimlessness.

meanings.definition: Moving or jumping from one thing to another; disconnected.
meanings.sent1: The desultory squirrel leaped from tree to tree in search of food.
meanings.sent2: Her desultory dance moves lacked coordination and fluidity.
meanings.sent3: The desultory cat chased after shadows, never catching anything.
meanings.sent4: His desultory thoughts flitted like butterflies, never settling on one idea.
meanings.sent5: The desultory flight of the butterfly seemed to mimic the chaos of life's changes.
